title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.1 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง 13.1 - Introduction

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to prescribe rules to prevent abuses in connection with the sale of personal property-liability insurance in this State pursuant to mass merchandising plans, while preserving for consumers the potential benefits of this form of merchandising. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11ยง
13.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
